Title: Not pleased with no AF
Cons:
The con is for the product description, not the lens itself. The auto-focus (AF) doesn't work with my NIkon D5100 camera. This isn't noted in the product description. From another seller's website in bold, large font:

Note! AF not supported by D40,D40X, D60, D3000 & D5000 cameras.

I probably would not have bought this lens if I knew the AF didn't work with my camera.
Pros: I haven't had a chance to use it yet...
